title: What is the difference between homeopathy and vaccination?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Vaccines, generally, induce an immune response by providing tiny amounts of antigens on a pathogen's surface in a buffered solution. It is injected into the body to induce this response. The safety and effectiveness of vaccines is supported by vast clinical trials published in pe...
